description: Enterprise techniques used by APT17, ATT&CK group G0025 v1.0
name: APT17 (G0025)

techniques.techniqueName: Develop social network persona digital footprint
techniques.comment: [APT17](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0025) created biographical sections on TechNet profile pages to appear more legitimate.(Citation: FireEye APT17)
[APT17](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0025) obfuscated infrastructure using a multi-layered malware beaconing approach. (Citation: FireEye APT17)
[APT17](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0025) posted in forum threads and created profile pages in Microsoft TechNet.(Citation: FireEye APT17)
